preface.title: Welcome to NEXUSe2e
preface.para: In the most simplified terms, NEXUSe2e allows software applications to communicate with each other and share information.

These applications may be in the same network (intranet), or may be separated by departmental, company, or even national boundaries. When computers talk to each other directly the communication is quicker, the transaction is cheaper, and the data is more accurate.

The most common use of this application has been to connect two or more trading partners to integrate the supply chain. However, understanding the functionality and flexibility of this product will help you to understand how to fully connect with applications inside and outside of your firewall. This manual is intended to provide a functional and technical understanding of the workings of the NEXUSe2e application.
There are 2 Major sections to this manual. The first section 'Before Using NEXUSe2e' is intended to provide you with an understanding of Business Messaging, and how the NEXUSe2e Server works.
The second section, 'Using the Web Interface' provides an in depth description of the system, and the functionality of all of the areas of NEXUSe2e.
Additionally, there is a 'Frequently Asked Questions' area that links directly to common questions and issues.
